front.title: Mapping Open Cybersecurity Schema Framework Events to Media over QUIC Transport

abstract.t: This document defines a mapping specification for representing Open Cybersecurity Schema Framework (OCSF) events, categories, and profiles using Media over QUIC Transport (MOQT) tracks. The mapping leverages MOQT's hierarchical data model and publish/subscribe architecture to enable real-time, in-network cached, scalable distribution of cybersecurity event data across networks while maintaining OCSF's structured taxonomy and semantic relationships.
